title.rendered: CONGRATULATION SITE MANAGEMENT TEAM OF CADIVI TOWER PROJECT

content.rendered:
Experiencing a highly challenging construction process, the commitment and dedication  of all engineers and supervisors over a long time has resulted in a superb Cadivi Tower.

The building consists of 4 basements and 12 upper floors located on Nam Ky Khoi Nghia street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.

Mr. Le Quoc Bao, the project’s site manager shared “The project is rushing to finish final steps before handing over to the Client. All construction processes must be done properly and carefully. Smooth collaboration between project team and company departments has contributed greatly to the  project’s success. “.
